article_html:
Rihanna, Beyoncé and Kim Kardashian were among the celebrities on the red carpet at this year's Met Ball in New York on Monday. Rihanna swooped in wearing a fur-trimmed yellow train with floral swirls of gold, so long it required three people to help her on the red carpet. The annual fundraising event, which has become a fashion showstopper, was this year celebrating the opening of a new exhibition China: Through the Looking Glass
